result.execSummary:
The defendant Andrew M H Pelky was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Theft-Movable Property <=$2500 [Modifiers: Repeater], a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 943.20(1)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

miscConds.notes: Maintain fulltime work/fulltime school or a combination and when not fully engaged must complete 10 hours community service per week.
No contact with Dickey's BBQ Pit-Wausau

Assessment, treatment, and counseling as recommended.
DNA Sample

If probation is revoked or discharged with outstanding financial obligations, a civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant in favor of restitution victims and/or governmental entities for the balance due.  All available enforcement actions will be used to collect the debt.  

A copy of the police report has been electronically sent to the probation office.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Andrew M H Pelky

records.addlTxt:
Case called: 2:38 pm 
Clerk: Kassidi.
State appears by ADA Kerri Puig:
Defendant appears in person pro se;
VRCW. Plea Quest/Waiver of Rights & Counsel filed.
 
PLEA: Ct. 1 (Theft-Movable Property-Repeater)>> GUILTY.
Crt advises def of rights & penalties & ques def to understanding.  Crt finds plea & waiver freely & vol made, a factual basis & def guilty.  

COURT ORDERS: Sentence W/H- 1 Year Probation. CONDITIONS: Assessment/treatment/counseling as recommended, Maintain Full time work/Full time school or combination and when not fully engaged must complete 10 hours Community Service a week, No contact with Dickey's BBQ Pit in Wausau, Court Costs, DNA Sample. 

Adjourned: 2:50 pm

Pre-trial conference on June 29, 2015 at 11:00 am.
Final pre-trial on July 20, 2015 at 01:30 pm.
Jury Trial on July 29, 2015 at 09:00 am.

No contact with victim(s): Dickey's BBQ Pit-Stewart Ave. Contact includes direct personal or physical and indirect contact by phone, in writing of any kind, entry to the person's residence or place of employment together with contacts through other persons.  Contact, however, may be made through the defendant's attorney.
